Title: Average phone

Title: Overall OK-OK
Review: Had this phone for about 2-3 day and here is my review:1) Body-wise, the phone is bit heavy but looks classy. - 4/52) Battery life also seems fine at the moment. - 3.5/53) The UI is same as other Samsung Galaxy M smartphones which is smooth and clutter free. - 4/54) The screen is big enough and features vibrant colors. - 4/55) Performance seems fine (not excellent btw) when using multiple apps. I haven't tested big games though. - 3.5/56) The worst part of this phone is its camera quality. I expected much better quality pics from dual 13 MP rear camera. - 2/5Final Verdict: Decent entry level smartphone from usability and performance standpoint. Avoid if camera quality is big concern for you.
Review_Date: 18 April 2023

Title: Just go for it!!
Review: It is way beyond just a simple Android phone for parents. It offers great features which even many expensive phones don't provide like :1.call recording without announcement2.dual accounts for WhatsApp and other chat apps3.dot indicator on screen top right corner which goes green upon using camera and red and orange also indicating use of microphone etc.4.Wifi scan and connect feature5. Wifi calling6.great sim connectivity in door and out doors ,with crystal clear calls7.Double touch to screen awake feature8.type -c charging port9.camera quality is also pretty decent with the help of samsung's optimisation10. Receives regular Android updates and got updated to Android 13 as well recently.Very few coins being:-1.charging takes a lot of time as the battery is very big but fast charger is not provided, however it supports fast charger....for which you have to purchase an adaptor seperately2. Slight heating issue when running multiple apps at once, but very minimal... nothing to worry about.
Review_Date: Reviewed in India ЁЯЗоЁЯЗ│ on 8 April 2023

Title: Slow though but it is Samsung brand has inherent VALUE
Review: Color awesomeScreen awesomeProcessing not at PAR with any competitors in this range, I am sorry, very slow speed.RAM has no value, my 2gb laptop 15 years old is very speedValue for Money no, depends, I trust on reliabilityIt is for my elderly Mom , harldy she uses WhatsApp, SoThis was my choice.Big screen,  nice rigid flip covers available , screenprotector , I have all safe guards.Note 8 was my Samusung mobile, not even single times, it has any fault in four years of serviceI fell in love, I upgraded to Note 20 Ultra,Awaiting for Samsung Note 23 Ultra, if upgrade makes sense, they I will definitely upgrade.My love for Samsung is unlimited, when it comes it S pen.Anyways, long story , but truly inclined,Choose wiselyOverall my MOM is happy, SoI guess I made a very right choice.Thanks Samsung n AmazonThanks for all who read this, as well.My bad, I am an author so mention, a big comprehensions
Review_Date: Reviewed in India ЁЯЗоЁЯЗ│ on 1 February 2023
